meta.content: Now Available: The Best of The End

body.head.hedline: Now Available: The Best of The End

body.content.p: A collection of the best, most moving obituaries from Macleanâ€™s in 2012 as they appeared on our hugely popular final page, The End
Always surprising and poignant, these obituaries feature an eclectic mix of ordinary Canadians whose deaths were often emblematic of the way they lived
Get it wherever ebooks are sold
